Class PlayerViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.PlayerViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerView.Observer
public class PlayerViewController extends Object implements PlayerView.Observer
Controller for the player view screen. Handles events from PlayerView and starts the game.

      public PlayerViewController(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, AmountOfPlayersViewController amountController, javafx.scene.Scene previousScene, GameType gameType, FullscreenHandler fullscreenHandler)
      Constructor of the controller.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the main application window
      amountController - controller for selection of number of players
      previousScene - the scene to return to if the user chooses the "Back" button

      public void onStartGame(List<PlayerView.PlayerData> players)

      Parameters:
